analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#89-90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#102-108)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#116-123)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#128-136)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#140-146)

FlipNpikAirdrop.distribute (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol#352-354) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_wallets[j],_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol)

FlipNpikAirdrop.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_wallets[j],_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/24/0x2ae01e591979f2aa1eeb2f53042261aefab2412c.sol)
